meanings.definition: The bony protrusions on either side of the ankle joint.
meanings.sent1: I twisted my ankle and felt pain in my malleoli.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined my malleoli to check for any fractures.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy dancer tripped over their malleoli during the performance.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the bones in her malleoli.
meanings.sent5: The malleoli acted as sturdy support beams for the ankle joint.

meanings.sent1: The X-ray showed both malleoli were intact.
meanings.sent2: He pointed to his malleoli and explained their importance in balance.
meanings.sent3: The twins compared the size of their malleoli for fun.
meanings.sent4: The malleoli stood out like twin peaks on the ankle.
meanings.sent5: The malleoli resembled small knobs on each side of the ankle.
